comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: Just around the corner from this photo: www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/3284102488/ My research shows that Milson Park was dedicated in 1898, and there should be an avenue of palm trees where the group are standing, which shows up clearly in the Google satellite picture. The trees in protective cages could be the jacarandas along McDougall Street today. Ref: www.environment.gov.au/cgi-bin/ahdb/search.pl?mode=place_... Google maps satellite view: maps.google.com/maps?f=q&source=s_q&hl=en&geo...

comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called slope,slope,slope, and we'd love to have this added to the group!
